sourcesContent:
<template>
    <!-- 这个是view，视图 -->
    <ItemMusicTop :playlist="state.playlist"/>
    <!-- 这是歌单详细页的view -->
    <!-- 向子组件中传入了Playlist这个数据 -->

    <ItemMusicList/>
</template>

<script>
import { onMounted,reactive } from 'vue';
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router';
import { getMusicItemList ,getItemList} from '@/requests/api/item';


import ItemMusicTop from '@/components/item/ItemMusicTop'
import ItemMusicList from '@/components/item/ItemMusicList'
//引入子组件
//从这里我导入的是axios中的服务，返回getMusicItemList这个函数
//获取路由的参数或者是数据

export default {
    setup() {


        const state = reactive({
            playlist: {
                creator:{}
            }
        })


        onMounted(async () => {
            //获取到里面的id属性,id为query里的一个属性
            //useRoute的含义,获取传入的id
            let id = useRoute().query.id
            
            let res = await getMusicItemList(id);
            //这里就是导入了id作为data
           
            state.playlist = res.data.playlist
            // state里面的playlist

        })
        return { state }
    },

    components:{
        ItemMusicTop,
        ItemMusicList,
    }
}



</script>
